sourcesContent:
this is a Literate CoffeeScript file ------------------------------------ AngTangle.module "app", [] AngTangle.config ($routeProvider, views) -> addRoute = (name, url="/#{name}") -> $routeProvider.when url, template: views["views/#{name}"] controller: name $routeProvider.otherwise redirectTo: "/" addRoute "home", "/" addRoute "hello" AngTangle.controller ($scope) -> $scope.text = world: "WORLD!!!" AngTangle.controller ($scope) -> AngTangle.constant 'data', {} AngTangle.constant 'views', { "views/hello": "

Hello, ", "views/home": "

Welcome to the home page!" }
